result.title: Subset problem
result.content:
Hello . I have a question and I want your help . Given N and a set containing N numbers we want to output all of the substes of the set . And the sum of the numbers of the subset

Example :

Input :

3

1 2 3

1 ----> 1

2 ----> 2

3 ----> 3

1 2 ----> 3

1 3 ----> 4

2 3 ----> 5

1 2 3 ----> 6
